snippet: Our summer reading contest begins on Friday and lasts all summer. If you're still not convinced you should participate, you should read what this New Jersey high school teacher has to say.

headline.main: Guest Blog | 'Taking a Dip in the Nonfiction Pool' With Our Summer Reading Contest
